workExperience.description: Analyzed customer data and automated reporting processes using Python and SQL. Developed Tableau dashboards to enhance marketing strategies.
Provided data-driven optimization solutions for retail clients, supporting operational efficiency.
Contributed to the product lifecycle of a mobile app through user feedback gathering and requirements definition.

projectExperience.description: Led analysis of customer behavior and proposed optimization strategies for an e-commerce platform.

education.description: Completed coursework in Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning, SQL for Data Science, and Software Engineering.
